title: Miner connectivity
subtitle: End to end connectivity check, validating the miner ability to receive storage deals, and CIDgravity connectivity.

finishedSuccess.title: All tests successfully passed
finishedSuccess.description: This miner is reachable and properly configured and to receive storage deals with CIDgravity.

errorCodes.timeout: An error occurred whilst trying to test the miner connectivity, please try again later or contact the CIDgravity team.

ERR_NO_PEER_ID_SET_ON_CHAIN.name: Testing Peer ID set on chain
ERR_NO_PEER_ID_SET_ON_CHAIN.resolveTips: Set the Peer ID on chain using the following commands (given that boost init generates a new identity) :
ERR_NO_PEER_ID_SET_ON_CHAIN.resolveTipsCommand:
# Get the miner Peer ID
PEER_ID=$(boostd net id)
# Show Peer ID
echo "$PEER_ID"
# Set the Peer ID on chain
lotus-miner actor set-peer-id "$PEER_ID"

ERR_NO_MULTI_ADDRESS_SET_ON_CHAIN.name: Testing Multiaddr set on chain
ERR_NO_MULTI_ADDRESS_SET_ON_CHAIN.resolveTips:
Set the Multiaddr on chain using the following actions :
1. Get the value of LibP2P ListenAddresses from boostd config.toml
2. Set the Multiaddr on chain :

ERR_INVALID_MULTI_ADDRESS_IN_MINER_INFO.resolveTips:
Set the correct Multiaddr on chain using the following actions :
1. Get the value of LibP2P ListenAddresses from boostd config.toml
2. Set the new Multiaddr on chain :
ERR_INVALID_MULTI_ADDRESS_IN_MINER_INFO.name: Testing Multiaddr is valid

ERR_CONNECT_MINER_PEER_ID.name: Testing miner Peer ID reachability
ERR_CONNECT_MINER_PEER_ID.resolveTips:
1. Verify miner libP2P port is publicly reachable.
2. Set the correct Peer ID on chain using the following commands (given that boost init generates a new identity) :
ERR_CONNECT_MINER_PEER_ID.resolveTipsCommand:
# Get the miner Peer ID
PEER_ID=$(boostd net id)
# Show Peer ID
echo "$PEER_ID"
# Set the Peer ID on chain
lotus-miner actor set-peer-id "$PEER_ID"

ERR_CIDGRAVITY_SIDE.name: CIDgravity connectivity test service is unavailable
ERR_CIDGRAVITY_SIDE.resolveTips: An error occurred whilst trying to test the miner connectivity, please try again later or contact the CIDgravity team.

ERR_DEAL_PROTOCOL_UNSUPPORTED.name: Testing Markets node protocol
ERR_DEAL_PROTOCOL_UNSUPPORTED.resolveTips: Consider running the last stable version of boost or venus

ERR_NO_MATCHING_DEAL_PROTOCOL_SUPPORTED.name: Testing Markets node compatibility
ERR_NO_MATCHING_DEAL_PROTOCOL_SUPPORTED.resolveTips: Consider running the last stable version of boost or venus

ERR_BUILDING_DEAL_PROPOSAL.name: CIDgravity connectivity test service is unavailable

ERR_TIMEOUT.name: CIDgravity connectivity test service is unavailable
ERR_TIMEOUT.resolveTips: An error occurred whilst trying to test the miner connectivity, please try again later or contact the CIDgravity team.

ERR_OPEN_STREAM_TO_ADDRESS_FOR_GET_ASK.name: Testing miner get-ask
ERR_OPEN_STREAM_TO_ADDRESS_FOR_GET_ASK.resolveTips: Cannot get miner get-ask info. Verify locally the pricing is properly set
